name: Build On Mars
description:
You can choose various building materials, build modern and building design that you want to create.

You can also obtain Mars view experiences in your room and play in Oculus Quest 2.

Instruction to Play

- Press Button B - Open or Close Builder Tool Selection Menu.

- Grab Hand Trigger to select a builder tool.

- Grab Hand Trigger to grab/pick an object.

- Press Button A - Build an object.

- Touch Button B (Not press Down) - Move preview highlight object freely again after it snapped to a position.

- Press Button X - Rotate a preview object 30 degree.

- Release Hand Trigger to cancel building, and press B to open menu and change builder tool.

- Press Button Y - Open teleporter and then Button X to teleport.

- Press B to open menu and select Hammer tool - Destroy the object by hitting it.
